name: Initial S: The Lord Appearing to David in the Water
description: Initial S: The Lord Appearing to David in the Water; Bute Master (Franco-Flemish, active about 1260 - 1290); Paris (written), France; text and illumination about 1285; Tempera colors, gold, and iron gall ink on parchment; Leaf: 17 × 11.9 cm (6 11/16 × 4 11/16 in.); Ms. 46, fol. 92; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Initial S: The Lord Appearing to David in the Water
medium: Tempera colors, gold, and iron gall ink on parchment
